title: PUCSL announces power interruptions schedule for tomorrow
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has approved the Ceylon Electricity Board’s request for power interruptions tomorrow (March 09).
Accordingly, areas listed under groups A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, and J will experience power cuts of 2 hours and 30 minutes between 8.00 a.m. and 6.00 p.m.
Electricity supply for the aforementioned areas will be interrupted again for a period of one hour and 15 minutes between 6.00 p.m. and 11.00 p.m.
In the meantime, areas mentioned under groups P, Q, R, S, T, U, V, and W will experience a 2-hour power interruption between 9.00 a.m. and 5.00 p.m.
These areas will experience a one-hour power cut between 5.00 p.m. and 9.00 p.m.
